Container.Name: Coturn TURN Server (Unraid)
Container.Overview: This is a Coturn TURN server preconfigured for Unraid, with dynamic configuration generated from environment variables. Supports TURN, STUN, UDP, TCP, and optional TLS. Before installation, fill in REALM, EXTERNAL_IP, USERNAME, PASSWORD, and optional certificate paths.

Config.Name: REALM (Domain Name)
Config.Description: Enter your TURN server realm / domain name. Example: turn.mydomain.ae

Config.Name: PUBLIC IP (External Server IP)
Config.Description: Enter your server's PUBLIC IP address.

Config.Name: TLS Certificate Path (Optional)
Config.Description: Absolute path to your TLS certificate inside the container (optional).

Config.Name: TLS Private Key Path (Optional)
Config.Description: Absolute path to your private key inside the container (optional).

Config.Name: Appdata Folder
Config.Description: Appdata location where config and logs may be stored.
